title: Details of qualifications, duties and responsibilities for Licensed Electrical Engineer are as specified in Annexure-E
clause_text: Details of qualifications, duties and responsibilities for Licensed Electrical Engineer are as specified in Annexure-E. Procedure of appointment, declaration etc. is as specified in Annexure E-1, E-2.1, E-2.2, E-2.3 and registration process and fees for Licensed Electrical Engineer / Consultant is as specified in Appendix-C of UDCPR-2020, as the case may be.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Details of qualifications, duties and responsibilities for Licensed Electrical Engineer are as specified in Annexure-E. Procedure of appointment, declaration etc. is as specified in Annexure E-1, E-2.
